mapper.select: SELECT r.role_code, r.role_name FROM anvil_role r
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO anvil_role (role_code, role_name, role_desc, create_time, update_time ) VALUES (#{roleCode}, #{roleName}, #{roleDesc}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE SET anvil_role role_code=#{roleCode}, role_name=#{roleName}, role_desc=#{roleDesc}, update_time=now() WHERE id=#{id}
